agent_utterance: When cravings hit, try a 3-minute pause: step away from the snack area, take 3 slow breaths, drink a glass of water, and check your hunger level. If you're still hungry after 10 minutes, opt for a small protein snack (e.g., yogurt, tofu, nuts). This gentle Suwon-friendly approach supports stress-related cravings without big changes.
